backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining BookingSubmission type and storing demo class bookings in a Map with a query function to retrieve all submissions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three implemented features: admin dashboard page creation, backend connection with React Query, and header navigation link addition.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing components, pages, hooks, and configuration for the Takshashila Academia educational website.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining light and dark theme color palettes using OKLCH color system for the application.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script loading main.tsx for the Takshashila Academia application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router setup defining root layout with Header/Footer, home page route with all landing sections, and /admin route for AdminDashboard.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: About section component displaying Takshashila Academia's mission statement and six educational highlights with icons in a responsive grid.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Contact section displaying phone numbers with role labels, email, physical address in Pune, and business hours in card format with call-to-action buttons.
frontend/src/components/Courses.tsx: Courses section showcasing five main categories (UPSC, MPSC, NEET, JEE, Skill Development) with detailed subject breakdowns and icons for competitive exam preparation.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying Takshashila Academia branding, quick navigation links, contact information (phone numbers, email, address), and copyright notice with a Made with Love attribution.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header component with logo, desktop/mobile navigation menus, and smooth scrolling functionality to page sections; includes mobile hamburger menu toggle and admin link.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section featuring Takshashila Academia's main headline, tagline with motivational quote, CTA buttons for enrollment and course exploration, and statistics cards showing student count, success rate, and experience.
frontend/src/components/Introduction.tsx: Introduction section displaying four value proposition cards (Excellence, Personalized Learning, Passionate Teaching, Holistic Development) explaining why to choose Takshashila Academia.
frontend/src/components/Testimonials.tsx: Testimonials section showing six student and parent reviews in a grid layout, each with 5-star ratings, quotes, and reviewer details.
frontend/src/components/YouTubeGallery.t: Empty component file with no content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using Internet Identity, with automatic query invalidation when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hook that fetches all demo class booking submissions from the backend actor using TanStack Query.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a warm educational color palette (terracotta, sage, amber) for light and dark modes, plus custom fonts (Inter, Merriweather).
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the root component wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider for state management and authentication.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard page displaying demo class booking requests in a table with stats cards showing total bookings, participants, and latest request using data from useGetAllSubmissions hook.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the theme with custom colors using OKLCH color space, custom fonts (Inter, Merriweather), animations, and plugins for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document showing an educational institute website with completed admin dashboard features and pending requests for demo class booking form and updated student reviews.
